content.html: Also Major PSA: Masks are not there to make people "feel comfortable", they're proven to _actually reduce the spread of airborne disease_ to near 0. Framing it as a comfort thing shows a level of callousness that I cannot fathom.
content.value:
Also Major PSA: Masks are not there to make people "feel comfortable", they're proven to _actually reduce the spread of airborne disease_ to near 0.

Framing it as a comfort thing shows a level of callousness that I cannot fathom.
